alert.note: Alert for Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 24 at 9:13PM CDT until March 26 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Kiamichi River near Antlers affecting Pushmataha County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Kiamichi River near Antlers. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, minor flooding begins along the west bank of the Kiamichi River near Moyers. Campers along the river should move to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 24.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.9 feet tomorrow morning. - Action stage is 24.0 feet. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
